articles.author: David Zucchino
articles.title: A Country Where Driving Makes You a Target
articles.description: Afghanistan’s highways are prime killing fields, with travelers dying in roadside bombings, ambushes and airstrikes.
articles.content:
Because only provincial capitals are typically served by commercial airlines, local roads are the only way for many residents to reach jobs, family members and markets. Many flights are fully booked as people opt not to drive.
Two days after Professor Panjsh… [+1004 chars]

articles.title: Your Morning Briefing: Standouts
articles.description: Highlights from a year in Briefings world
articles.content:
Good morning.
Today were bringing you a special edition of the Briefing, which looks back at 2019 with the help of you, our readers. Were revisiting some of your favorite articles and features, and highlighting some that you might have missed.
